ygData.subject: RE: Petiton to replace level 14 song
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you wish to nitpick, then you are correct. We re not casters. But we have the equivilant of spells in our songs. We get *one* mystical power per level
ygData.messageBody:
> We are not casters. This comparison is silly.

If you wish to nitpick, then you are correct. We're
not casters. But we have the equivilant of spells
in our songs. We get *one* 'mystical power' per level
whereas other characters get *multiple* 'mystical
powers' per level. These 'mystical powers' are the
backbone of our class just as they are the backbone
of the other classes.

Does that fit your requirements a bit better? The
comparison isn't silly at all. We only get one
song per level. It would be nice to have that only
song be worthwhile. The poster I replied to was
comparing a caster having a useless 'power' to our
having a useless 'power'. I was pointing out that
when we have a single useless 'power' it's not the
same as a caster since they get more of these to
choose from than we do.

There's nothing silly in that.
